401.Title: Unauthorized
401.Message: Provided credentials do not match any user in the system

400.Title: Bad Request
400.Message: The request was invalid or cannot be served

401.Title: Unauthorized
401.Message: The request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource

403.Title: Forbidden
403.Message: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it

404.Title: Not Found
404.Message: The requested resource could not be found

405.Title: Method Not Allowed
405.Message: A request method is not supported for the requested resource

406.Title: Not Acceptable
406.Message: The requested resource is capable of generating only content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request

408.Title: Request Timeout
408.Message: The server timed out waiting for the request

409.Title: Conflict
409.Message: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource

500.Title: Internal Server Error
500.Message: The server has encountered a situation it doesn't know how to handle

501.Title: Not Implemented
501.Message: The request method is not supported by the server and cannot be handled

502.Title: Bad Gateway
502.Message: The server received an invalid response from an upstream server

limit.Title: Rate Limit Exceeded
limit.Message: You have exceeded the rate limit for this request

2fa-failed.Title: 2FA validation failed
2fa-failed.Message: The provided code could not be validated.
